CustomField.formula: IF(manufacturingAssignmentComplete__c, IF(Requires_PE_Approval__c && ISPICKVAL(plantEngineerApproval__c,""), "PE" , CASE( qualityEngineerApproval__c , "Reviewed - More Information Required", "AE", "Approved - Requires Plant Eng Approval", "PE", "Approved - Includes Plant Eng Approval", "", "Not Approved", "", "Reassign CM", "", "Not Required", "", "Customer Responded - QA to Confirm", "QA", "QA") ), "")
CustomField.label: Primary Risk Owner Role
